meta.name: description
meta.content: The Hattiesburg Public School District is a model teaching and learning community that graduates productive and caring citizens who are prepared to succeed. Hattiesburg PSD serves K-12 Students in Hattiesburg, Mississippi.

p.b: Hattiesburg High School culinary arts ribbon cutting

div.div: Today's Learners, Tomorrow's Leaders
Welcome to Hattiesburg Public School District!Â I am happy to welcome you to the 2019-20 school year!

We are looking forward to a productive partnership with you to ensure our children can achieve their highest potential. Take your time and browse through our website to find out more information about our Tiger Community!Â
